Function reference

All functions

acs_survey_match() acs_survey_sample() acs_survey_ts() acs_survey_label() acs_survey_label_table()
Assorted helpers for ACS survey types and labels
cols_merge_uncert_ext()
Merge columns to a value-with-uncertainty column
fmt_acs_estimate() fmt_acs_percent() cols_label_ext()
Format estimate and margin of error columns (or % estimate and % margin of error columns) in a gt table
fmt_acs_jam_values()
Replace placeholder jam values in an ACS data frame
get_acs_tables() get_acs_geographies() get_acs_geography()
Get multiple ACS tables or multiple tables for multiple geographies
get_acs_ts()
Get a time series of ACS data
gt_acs()
Format American Community Survey estimate and percent estimate columns for a gt table
join_acs_parent_column()
Use parent column IDs to join parent column titles to ACS data
make_area_xwalk()
Make a crosswalk data frame for U.S. Census tracts and arbitrary areas based on block-level attributes
make_block_xwalk()
Make a crosswalk data frame for U.S. Census blocks and tracts
select_acs_cols()
Helper function to select columns typically used in an ACS table
tab_acs_source_note()
Add a Census data source note to a gt table
tigerweb_geo_index
U.S. Census Bureau ArcGIS Services Index
vec_get_acs()
Vectorized variant of tidycensus::get_acs

Developed by Eli Pousson.
